txt.en: Framsburg can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should learn the history of the Rohirrim with Léothred.
'Come, let us search the ruins of Framsburg once more and learn what we can about Fram.'
'Taking up Wrothbláda, he left the ruins of Fasthálla and set out alone into the wild.'
'I will find that worm and slay it.'
'None saw him again for two long years.'

'Frumgar’s mood grew blacker and blacker. He had led his people out of danger and into death, it seemed. Now it looked as it might have cost him the son he had hoped to spare. Fasthálla remained a broken keep, haunt of a fading people. Hope was not lost, however.'
'Fram’s wife , the shieldmaiden Sigrith, soon despaired that he would not return.'
Léothred, the Rohirric scholar, wishes to learn more about Fram's history and the decisions that he made in life.
'I have all but lost hope that my Fram shall return.'
Learn the history of the Rohirrim with Léothred
Continue learning the history of the Rohirrim with Léothred
Léothred can be found at Framsburg.\n\nYou should talk to Léothred at Framsburg.

'The Ai-thúda were badly hurt by Scatha’s onslaught, and Fram knew another attack might be the end for his people.\n\n'Come, let us search the ruins of Framsburg once more and learn what we can about Fram.'
Framsburg can be found in Misthallow.\n\nYou should learn the history of the Rohirrim with Léothred.
